address: 272 Canal Street, New York, New York 10013
notes: Inspection Note: Landlord (XXXXXX) And Tenant (XXXXXX) Cleared Location 272 Canal Street, "c" Of All Merchandise.at Approximately 2:30pm A Male Known To The Tenant Entered The Location And Began Assissting In Packing The Inventory. At Approximately 3:29pm A Middle Age Asian Man Arrived To Load Up The His Toyota Mini Van XXXXXX For The 3rd. Time. There Where 3 Large Wheeled Suitcases Loaded With Perfumes And Watches Near The Corner Of Cortlandt Alley. I Asked The Loader By Passing The Suitcases And Asked Why He Isn't He Putting The Suitcases In The Vehicle. He Pointed To The Friend/worker Of The Tentant And He Said "not To Load The Suitcases". I Told Him To Load The Suitcases. At This Time The Unknown Loader Exited 272 Canal And Unloaded A Tirade At Me. I Identified Myself By Showing Him My I.D.. He Told Me The Bags Where Staying And I Told Him No They Now Belong To XXXXXX When The Van/laborer Started Moving The Suitcases The Tenants Laborer Ran Up To Me And Spit In My Face Hitting Me In The Eye. He Then Took His Umbrella Swung It At Me. I Blocked The Blow With My Left Wrist. He Swung A Second Time, I Belive Hitting XXXXXX In The Face. He Droped The Umbrella And Ran East On Canal Street.
